# Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Title
Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) - Settlement Agreement and Childhood Claims Branch - Research Analysis and Document Management Services - Standing Offer Agreement (Firms) - Set Aside

### Notice Details
* Solicitation Number: 1000248045
* Tender Closing Date: July 5, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
* Contract Type: Standing Offer Agreement (SOA)
* Procurement Category: Services

### Description
The Settlement Agreement and Childhood Claims Branch of CIRNAC is seeking suppliers (firms) to provide research analysis and document management services in support of its mandate to resolve Indigenous childhood claims litigation. The services will include research analysis, document management, and written presentation of documentary evidence from historical sources, government records, and relevant professionals. The SOA will be awarded for two years with the option to extend for an additional year.

### Background
In 2016, the Canadian government adopted a conciliatory approach to resolve historic Indigenous childhood claims litigation outside of the courts. This initiative aims to support reconciliation, healing, and language, culture, and commemoration. The current childhood claims inventory includes litigation and settlement implementation related to day scholars, federal Indian day schools, Sixties Scoop, and other similar cases.

### Procurement Requirements
The required services will support the litigation process and settlement agreement implementation. The services include:

* Research analysis of documentary evidence
* Document management and organization of historical sources and government records
* Written presentation of documentary evidence
* Support for settlement agreement implementation

### Evaluation Criteria
The Standing Offer Agreements (SOAs) will be awarded based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business.
